name: Plivo
headline: Plivo enables businesses to add SMS, Voice capability into their apps.
description: Plivo is a cloud based API platform that enables businesses to easily build and integrate voice and SMS capabilities into their applications and workflows.  Plivo provides connectivity across 190+ countries and has direct relationships with over 1600 carrier networks globally. Whether you're looking to add voice and SMS capabilities to your website, mobile app, or business workflow, Plivo has the tools and resources you need to get started.

founders.name: Venky B, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO at plivo.com, Green Tea Enthusiast, Dog Lover

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/65fe8b1b61e9120bf54a40ec_ic_warning.svg)
Thanks for your interest in Plivo. We have **two account options** available to meet customers’ varying needs:
  * **Self-service** : no commitment, standard pricing, free basic support.
  * **Committed spend agreement** : guided implementation, premium support options, and discounted rates. These packages involve an annual contract starting at $750 a month.


Based on the information that you provided, a self-service account seems like the right fit for your business. Use the links below to get started:
  * [Sign up for your Plivo account](https://plivo.com/<https:/console.plivo.com/accounts/register/>)
  * [SMS standard pricing](https://plivo.com/<#>)
  * [Voice standard pricing](https://plivo.com/<#>)
  * [Developer documentation](https://plivo.com/<https:/www.plivo.com/docs/messaging/>)
  * [Create a support ticket](https://plivo.com/<https:/support.plivo.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000156292>)
  * [10DLC information](https://plivo.com/<https:/support.plivo.com/hc/en-us/articles/360054871572-A2P-10DLC>)


If you’d like to discuss a committed spend agreement, please provide us a bit more information by [filling out this form.](https://plivo.com/<#>)

### Plivo CX
From personalized marketing campaigns to automated customer service, this all-in-one solution helps you attract, convert, and retain customers. Bring it all together with Plivo CX.
[Learn More](https://plivo.com/<https:/www.plivo.com/cx/>)
![Plivo CX](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/679413fe15499aabd5a41b3e_CX.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/6762b0d42f292e43ab6ec2ac_112-sound%20bar.svg)
### Voice API
Use Plivo's Voice API to build AI-powered voice agents, create voice surveys, set-up automated alerts, conference bridges for team collaboration, and create intelligent IVR menus that route calls efficiently.
[Learn More](https://plivo.com/</voice/>)
![Voice API](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/679413fd15499aabd5a41b0b_Voice.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/675bedde81852ff67234c2c9_messages.svg)
### SMS API
Plivo’s SMS API allows businesses to send and receive text messages programmatically. Automate notifications, confirmations, reminders, and promotional messages directly from their applications.
[Learn More](https://plivo.com/</sms/>)
![SMS API](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/679413fd714d143091e6be9a_SMS.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/6762b3662250735a9a489d68_025-shield.svg)
### Verify API
Protect your platform with Plivo's Verify API. Deploy instant user verification across 150+ countries with industry-leading 95% conversion rates. Multi-channel support via SMS, Voice, and WhatsApp ensures you reach every user securely.
[Learn More](https://plivo.com/</verify/>)
![Verify API](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/679413fe95383a41d3401ea5_Verify%20API.webp)
![whatsapp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6565737286e587567248583f/67aaf3adbc29dcb54f6cd0e1_048-whatsapp.svg)
### Whatsapp Business API
Plivo's WhatsApp Business API lets you send programmatic messages while our AI chatbot handles customer service 24/7. Create meaningful conversations that drive results.
[Learn More](https://plivo.com/</whatsapp/>)

generated_description:
**Plivo Overview**

Founded in 2011 and rooted in Austin, TX, Plivo has emerged as a significant player in the cloud communications space. As a member of Y Combinator's Batch S12, it has established itself as a leading API platform that empowers businesses to integrate SMS and voice communication capabilities into their applications easily.

**Mission Statement**
Plivo's mission is straightforward: to enable businesses to enhance their applications with SMS and voice capabilities, streamlining how they interact with customers around the globe.

**Service and Reach**
Plivo offers a robust cloud API that provides connectivity in over 190 countries, maintaining direct relationships with more than 1,600 carrier networks worldwide. This extensive reach ensures that businesses can implement reliable communication solutions tailored to their needs, whether through a website, mobile app, or internal workflow.

**Team and Growth**
With a growing team of approximately 320 employees, Plivo continues to expand its resources and strategies to ensure quality service. Their focus ranges from providing tools for SMS and voice integration to offering volume pricing options and varied account types, accommodating different business needs.

**Offerings**
Plivo’s service suite includes:

- **SMS API:** Allows businesses to send and receive messages programmatically, facilitating automated notifications, confirmations, and marketing.
- **Voice API:** Integrates voice calling features, supporting applications like AI voice agents and automated alerts.
- **Verify API:** Ensures user verification across multiple channels, achieving high conversion rates for two-factor authentication.
- **WhatsApp Business API:** Enables businesses to automate customer engagement through WhatsApp, enhancing interaction and service availability.

Additionally, Plivo caters to a variety of industries, from healthcare to finance and retail, making it an attractive option for enterprises, startups, and nonprofits alike.

**Account Options**
Plivo provides two main account types to meet different needs:
1. **Self-service:** Pay-as-you-go structure with standard pricing and basic support.
2. **Committed spend agreements:** Offers premium support and discounted rates under annual contracts starting at $750/month.

**What Sets Plivo Apart?**
Customers consistently choose Plivo for its reliable platform, consultative approach, and straightforward user experience that simplifies complex communication needs. They have built a reputation for delivering a solid infrastructure that supports high message volumes seamlessly.

**Key Takeaway**
In a world where effective communication is paramount, Plivo stands out as a versatile, easy-to-use platform that democratizes access to powerful SMS and voice APIs at scale. Its commitment to customer success and innovation positions it as a pivotal ally for businesses looking to modernize their communication strategies.

For more information, visit [Plivo's website](https://plivo.com).
